sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含"欣赏"之意。
means: appreciate ：多用于文学方面，强调对事物有深入的理解能力，且能鉴赏。
enjoy ：普通用词，使用广泛，程度不及appreciate,多指从外界事物中得到喜悦与满足，领略到乐趣，享受意味强。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"有，具有，持有"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: have, hold, own, possess, keep, enjoy
means: have ： 最常用词，可指任何情况下的具有，无论是物质的或精神的。
hold ： 指拥有并保持财产及持有见解等，暗示不让别人拿走或占有。
own不及本组的possess正式，多指所属关系，强调所有权，不管所属物是否在物主手中。
possess ： 较正式，指拥有或占有并能加以控制与支配，强调其归属；也指具有某种品质、才能、特点或性能等。
keep ： 指长时间地保有，保存某物，防止别人占去，强调安全和感情上的依附。
enjoy ： 指享有某种权利或长处，带有欣赏或喜爱的情感。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"喜欢，喜爱"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: like, love, enjoy, fancy, adore, prefer
means: like ： 最常用词，往往只表不太强烈的兴趣或关注，不带强烈的感情，除非另加修饰语。
love ： 不但表示强烈的喜欢，而且含依恋之情，因此多用于能激起深厚情感的人或物。
enjoy ： 指对能提供感观或智力上满足或快乐的东西表示欣赏或喜爱。
fancy ： 指喜爱投合自己心意、嗜好或欲望等的人或物。
adore ： 非正式用词，口语体。指非常喜爱，带强烈的感情色彩。
prefer ： 指有选择性或偏向性的喜欢。

sentence.Network_en: I enjoy pleasure as much as the next person.
Boys and girls will enjoy messing about with any kind of machine.
sentence.Network_cn: 男孩和女孩会喜欢摆弄各种机械装置。

sentence.Network_en: I have been a shooter for 16 years and enjoy my sport.
sentence.Network_cn: 我从事射击运动已经16年了，很喜爱这项运动。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 享受 (enJOY)，是对Joy自我的盼望茫茫大海中的一粒小沙， 努力的呼吸新鲜空气， 浪来浪走， 我，还是我。

英语doing与to do的区别_爱问知识人 ... contemplate 细想 enjoy 享有，喜爱 defer 拖延.

list.abs: 冀教版初中英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... enjoy v. 喜欢；享受„乐趣 enjoy oneself 过得快乐；玩得痛快 enjoyable adj. 愉快的；有趣的.
新概念英语第二册_百度百科 ... go to + 地点：去某地做相关的事 enjoy oneself 玩得开心 I got angry. （强调变化过程）.
七下英语短语、重点句子 - 豆丁网 ... next to 在……的旁边 enjoy doing sth. 喜欢做某事 keep money 存钱.
邢台婚纱摄影_邢台绝色婚纱摄影 ... Latest work 最新作品 Customers enjoy 客片欣赏 Dynamic news 新闻动态.
高中英语作文 ... 愉快地工作( Happiness at Work) 享受生活( Enjoy Life) 给儿子的信( A Letter to My Son).

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French enjoier 'give joy to' or enjoïr 'enjoy', both based on Latin gaudere 'rejoice'

encyclopedia.content: OPPO Enjoy电子书阅读器 OPPO首款基于Android机器人智能平台的电子书阅读器（Ebook）命名为Enjoy。电子书阅读器是基于Eink电子墨水屏幕的新型阅读工具，区别于传统LCD屏幕显示器，Eink具有类似纸质书籍的阅读效果，无背光，在阳光下也可以阅读，无辐射，健康护眼，由于Eink是低功耗高节能的产品，显示时并不耗电，只有在页面刷新时才耗电，一次充电，OPPO Enjoy可以阅读6000页，换算成平均每天阅读3-4个小时，可以阅读半个月左右

entry.def: If you enjoy something, you find pleasure and satisfaction in doing it or experiencing it.

example.ex: Ross had always enjoyed the company of women...
example.tran: 罗斯向来喜欢有女人伴其左右。

example.ex: He was a guy who enjoyed life to the full...
example.tran: 他是个尽情享受生活的人。

entry.def: If you enjoy yourself, you do something that you like doing or you take pleasure in the situation that you are in.

example.ex: I must say I am really enjoying myself at the moment.
example.tran: 我得说此刻我感到非常愉快。

entry.def: If you enjoy something such as a right, benefit, or privilege, you have it.

example.ex: The average German will enjoy 40 days' paid holiday this year...
example.tran: 今年，德国人将平均享受40天的带薪假期。

example.ex: He enjoys a reputation for honesty.

means.word_mean: 1. derive or receive pleasure from; get enjoyment from; take pleasure in;

sentences.sentence: "She relished her fame and basked in her glory"

Sentence.sentence: I really enjoy that piece you just play on the piano.
Over 50% of the 12 to 18 years old interviewed say they enjoy reading a lot
Even though many teenagers in the US enjoy reading, they still have other interests.
And with women a second factor comes into play:most seem to enjoy the flexible-time arrangement(once known as the "mommy track")and never find their way back to full-time or high-level employment.
they have enjoyed the protection of government agencies with titles like the Ministry of Integration and Gender Equality and the Secretariat of Gender Research.
Oh, yesterday I finally got around to that new barbershop in the mall and enjoyed their services.

sentences.en: They are entitled to enjoy many advantages and privileges.
sentences.cn: 他们有资格享有许多优惠和特权。

means.word_mean: 玩得快乐, 过得快活

sentences.en: We enjoyed the picnic until a thunderstorm intervened.

jushi.english: She enjoyed the music for less than five minutes before she was wanted on the phone.
jushi.chinese: 她听了不到5分钟的音乐,就有人来电话找她。

jushi.english: In our country women enjoy equal rights with men in political life as well as in family life.
jushi.chinese: 在我国,妇女在政治和家庭生活上享有和男人同等的权利。
您对这次旅行感到愉快吗?
